Body.Description: Type definition for a Hypervisor Host.
Body.Label: ESXi Host
Body.Name: HypervisorHostType

TypeDefinition.Description: Size must be a number (used in conjunction with unit).
TypeDefinition.Label: Size
TypeDefinition.Name: VolumeSize

TypeDefinition.Description: Unit is a string with a single character unit symbol. Valid unit symbols are K, M, G, T, and P representing Bytes, Kilobyte, Megabyte, Gigabyte, Terabyte, and Petabyte respectively, where one Kilobyte equals 1024 Bytes, one Megabyte equals 1048576 Bytes and so on.
TypeDefinition.Label: Unit
TypeDefinition.Name: VolumeUnit

Body.Description: Get details of a datastore. Inputs are datacenter, cluster (or host), and datastore. On successful execution, the NaaId (Network Addressing Authority Id), LUN number of datastore, host name, datastore name are generated as outputs for VMFS datastores and remote host, remote hostname, remote path, security type and datastore name are generated as outputs for NFS type datastores.
Body.Label: Get Hypervisor Datastore
Body.Name: GetHypervisorDatastore

InputDefinition.Description: Datacenter associated with the datastore.
InputDefinition.Label: Datacenter
InputDefinition.Name: Datacenter

InputDefinition.Description: Cluster on which the datastore will be hosted.
InputDefinition.Label: Cluster
InputDefinition.Name: Cluster

InputDefinition.Description: Host on which the datastore will be hosted. If cluster is specified, then host will be ignored.
InputDefinition.Label: Host
InputDefinition.Name: Host

InputDefinition.Description: Datastore for which information is needed.
InputDefinition.Label: Datastore
InputDefinition.Name: Datastore

OutputDefinition.Description: Datastore for which information was gathered.
OutputDefinition.Label: Datastore
OutputDefinition.Name: Datastore

OutputDefinition.Description: NaaId (Network Addressing Authority Id) of the datastore without the naa. prefix.
OutputDefinition.Label: NaaId of Datastore
OutputDefinition.Name: NAAId

OutputDefinition.Description: Cluster on which the datastore will be hosted.
OutputDefinition.Label: Cluster
OutputDefinition.Name: Cluster

OutputDefinition.Description: Host on which the datastore will be hosted. If cluster is specified, then host will be ignored.
OutputDefinition.Label: Host
OutputDefinition.Name: Host

OutputDefinition.Description: LUN Number of datastore.
OutputDefinition.Label: LUN Number
OutputDefinition.Name: LUNNumber

OutputDefinition.Description: Type of datastore
OutputDefinition.Label: Datastore Type
OutputDefinition.Name: DatastoreType

OutputDefinition.Description: Capacity of datastore (in bytes)
OutputDefinition.Label: Capacity
OutputDefinition.Name: Capacity

OutputDefinition.Description: Available free space on datastore
OutputDefinition.Label: Free
OutputDefinition.Name: Free

OutputDefinition.Description: Remote host of the datastore (NFS only)
OutputDefinition.Label: Remote Host
OutputDefinition.Name: RemoteHost

OutputDefinition.Description: Remote path of the datastore (NFS only)
OutputDefinition.Label: Remote Path
OutputDefinition.Name: RemotePath

OutputDefinition.Description: Remote hostnames of the datastore (NFS only)
OutputDefinition.Label: Remote HostNames
OutputDefinition.Name: RemoteHostNames

OutputDefinition.Description: Security type of the datastore (NFS only)
OutputDefinition.Label: Security Type
OutputDefinition.Name: SecurityType

OutputDefinition.Description: Protocol endpoint (NFS only)
OutputDefinition.Label: Protocol Endpoint
OutputDefinition.Name: ProtocolEndpoint

Body.Description: Find a volume with server ip address and mount path as the inputs. If a volume exists, then volume name and storage virtual machine name are generated as outputs.
Body.Label: Find NetApp Volume by ID
Body.Name: FindNetAppVolumeById

InputDefinition.Description: Server IP address.
InputDefinition.Label: Server IP Address
InputDefinition.Name: ServerIPAddress

InputDefinition.Description: Mount path for the volume (e.g., /volume3).
InputDefinition.Label: Mount Path
InputDefinition.Name: MountPath

OutputDefinition.Description: Storage virtual machine name.
OutputDefinition.Label: Storage Virtual Machine
OutputDefinition.Name: StorageVirtualMachineName

Body.Description: Expand or shrink a volume with storage virtual machine name, volume name, and size as inputs. On successful execution, volume name and size are generated as outputs.
Body.Label: Update NetApp Volume Capacity
Body.Name: UpdateNetAppVolumeCapacity

InputDefinition.Description: Storage virtual machine name.
InputDefinition.Label: Storage Virtual Machine
InputDefinition.Name: StorageVirtualMachineName

InputDefinition.Description: Volume name.
InputDefinition.Label: Volume
InputDefinition.Name: VolumeName

InputDefinition.Description: Volume size and unit.
InputDefinition.Label: Volume Capacity
InputDefinition.Name: VolumeCapacity

Body.Description: Expand the specified datastore to its full extent on a given hypervisor. Requires datacenter, cluster (or host), and datastore inputs. The expanded capacity is visible to all hosts connected to the datastore. On successful execution, the name, capacity, free space of the datastore, datacenter, and host name are generated as outputs.
Body.Label: Expand Hypervisor Datastore
Body.Name: ExpandHypervisorDatastore

InputDefinition.Description: Hypervisor on which the datastore resides.
InputDefinition.Label: Hypervisor Manager
InputDefinition.Name: Vcenter

InputDefinition.Description: Datacenter associated with the specified datastore.
InputDefinition.Label: Datacenter
InputDefinition.Name: Datacenter

InputDefinition.Description: Cluster on which the datastore will be hosted.
InputDefinition.Label: Cluster
InputDefinition.Name: Cluster

InputDefinition.Description: Host on which the datastore will be hosted. If cluster is specified, then host will be ignored.
InputDefinition.Label: Host
InputDefinition.Name: Host

InputDefinition.Description: Datastore to be expanded.
InputDefinition.Label: Datastore
InputDefinition.Name: Datastore

OutputDefinition.Description: Datacenter associated with the specified datastore.
OutputDefinition.Label: Datacenter
OutputDefinition.Name: Datacenter

OutputDefinition.Description: Datastore that was expanded.
OutputDefinition.Label: Datastore
OutputDefinition.Name: Datastore

OutputDefinition.Description: Cluster on which the datastore will be hosted.
OutputDefinition.Label: Cluster
OutputDefinition.Name: Cluster

OutputDefinition.Description: Host on which the datastore will be hosted. If cluster is specified, then host will be ignored.
OutputDefinition.Label: Host
OutputDefinition.Name: Host

OutputDefinition.Description: Provisioned Capacity of the expanded datastore.
OutputDefinition.Label: Provisioned capacity
OutputDefinition.Name: Capacity

OutputDefinition.Description: Free space remaining on the expanded datastore.
OutputDefinition.Label: Free space
OutputDefinition.Name: FreeSpace

Body.Description: Update a NAS datastore by updating the capacity of the underlying NFS volume. The updated capacity is visible to all hosts connected to the datastore.

InputDefinition.Description: Datacenter associated with the datastore.
InputDefinition.Label: Datacenter
InputDefinition.Name: Datacenter

InputDefinition.Description: Cluster on which the datastore is hosted.
InputDefinition.Label: Cluster
InputDefinition.Name: Cluster

InputDefinition.Description: Host on which the datastore is hosted. If cluster is specified, then host will be ignored.
InputDefinition.Label: Host
InputDefinition.Name: Host

InputDefinition.Description: Datastore for which capacity is being updated.
InputDefinition.Label: Datastore
InputDefinition.Name: Datastore

InputDefinition.Description: Datastore/volume size and unit.
InputDefinition.Label: Datastore Capacity
InputDefinition.Name: VolumeCapacity

Body.Label: Update NAS Datastore Using NetApp Smart Volume
Body.Name: UpdateNASDatastoreUsingNetAppSmartVolume
